QuestData.Title: A Slight Detour
QuestData.Description:
If this coven is drawing its power from these ancient ruins, then I may just know of something that could help us fight back.
Meet me at the first fork along the Highroad Pass. There is something there I want you to see.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Lucille Waycrest at Highroad Pass in Drustvar.
QuestData.RewardText:
Good, you are here.
Unfortunately it looks like we're not going to have an easy path to our destination.
